text: mariyu evaraite vari taruvata vaccaro! Variki andulo hakku undi. Varu ila antaru: "O ma prabhu! Mam'malni mariyu makante mundu visvasincina ma sodarulanu ksamincu. Mariyu ma hrdayalalo visvasula patla dvesanni kaligincaku. O ma prabhu! Niscayanga, nivu cala kanikarincevadavu, apara karuna pradatavu
